venue.address_1: 100 Milk Street Entrance (Ten PO Sq Bldg)
venue.name: Exemplar Law Partners, LLC

item.description:
Join the Revolve Nation community in the first seminar of the Legal Series: The ABCs of Legal Issues for Start-Up Companies. At this seminar, leaders of start-up companies will come together to learn about and discuss the variety of legal considerations for start-up companies in this engaging mix of seminar and discussion group. Learn the basics from a leading attorney from the areas most innovative law firm, and network with colleagues who are serious about growing their businesses properly. Space is limited, so remember to RSVP ASAP!


PRESENTED BY:

Christopher Marston, Esq. -- Chief Executive Officer of Exemplar Companies and Exemplar Law

SPONSORED BY:
Revolve - Accelerate the Revolution (Law, Business Execution, Capital, and Investment Banking focused exclusively on growing companies from start-up to exit event)

Exemplar Law - The first business law firm in the country to abandon hourly billing in favor of a fixed, value-based pricing model and a service guarantee!
item.name: LEGAL SERIES: The ABCs of Legal Issues for Start-Up Companies
